nodes.text: Doon Gorot was a male Duros weapon smuggler who lived during the time of the Clone Wars. Gorot acted as a go-between for a crime lord who was working for the Confederacy of Independent Systems and at some point during the conflict, Gorot traveled to a Separatist safe-house on the planet Clak'dor VII, to meet with the Separatist spy Bandor Ootka and discussed the sale of a shipment of weapons to the Separatists.
